CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
CurrentVersion.description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Pages - Design Ideas
CurrentVersion.description: By integrating with the Microsoft Designer service, we can now offer authors beautiful ways to improve the look and feel of their SharePoint pages. This is done through tailored section level design suggestions.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Pages - Design Ideas
OldVersion.description: By integrating with the Microsoft Designer service, we can now offer authors beautiful ways to improve the look and feel of their SharePoint pages. This is done through tailored section level design suggestions.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Out-of-the-box document library templates
CurrentVersion.description: We are bringing the goodness of List templates to SharePoint document libraries. Creating document libraries will now be a breeze with our ready-made templates with scenario relevant content, structure, metadata, and content types - all to save you time and maintain broader consistency across your content management organization.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Out-of-the-box document library templates
OldVersion.description:
We
are bringing the goodness of List templates to SharePoint document libraries.
Creating document libraries will now be a breeze with our ready-made templates
with scenario relevant content, structure, metadata, and content types - all to
save you time and maintain broader consistency across your content management
organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
OldVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bring the latest from your organization into your Word chats with Microsoft Copilot Graph-grounded search
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the rich, people-centric data and insights in the Microsoft cloud. That's the power of Copilot and Microsoft Graph.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Real-time policy tuning analysis
CurrentVersion.description: Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time policy alert prediction based on the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Real-time policy tuning analysis
OldVersion.description: Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time policy alert prediction based on the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Minecraft Education: Minecraft Education Summer Release
CurrentVersion.description: The next major update for Minecraft Education will include support for preview applications which can be installed side-by-side with the main Minecraft Education application. This update will add OneDrive-based cloud world storage for backup of worlds. It will also include the major features from Minecraft 1.21 such as trial chambers, breezes, and armadillos.  More features will be announced soon!

OldVersion.title: Minecraft Education: Minecraft Education Summer Release
OldVersion.description: The next major update for Minecraft Education will include support for preview applications which can be installed side-by-side with the main Minecraft Education application. This update will add OneDrive-based cloud world storage for backup of worlds. It will also include the major features from Minecraft 1.21 such as trial chambers, breezes, and armadillos.  More features will be announced soon!

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
CurrentVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows within File Chiclet
OldVersion.description: You will now be able to run instant workflows and create new file workflows via the file chiclet overflow menu (...)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Describe it to design it within Teams Workflows
CurrentVersion.description: Can't find a workflow template that matches what you need? You will now be able to describe in detail on how you want your automation to work and from that description generate a workflow to match your needs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Describe it to design it within Teams Workflows
OldVersion.description: Can't find a workflow template that matches what you need? You will now be able to describe in detail on how you want your automation to work and from that description generate a workflow to match your needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
OldVersion.description: Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users will now be notified when their admin unblocks a requested app
CurrentVersion.description: Users on teams will be notified when their IT Admin unblocks an app that was previously requested by the user.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users will now be notified when their admin unblocks a requested app
OldVersion.description: Users on teams will be notified when their IT Admin unblocks an app that was previously requested by the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab team prompt publishing
CurrentVersion.description: This feature gives commercial customers the ability to publish Copilot prompts to groups within their organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab team prompt publishing
OldVersion.description: This feature gives commercial customers the ability to publish Copilot prompts to groups within their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

OldVersion.title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Shortcuts to copy and paste emails (Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V) in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to copy and paste emails in Outlook using the shortcuts Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V, allowing them to quickly transfer emails to the desired folder, streamlining workflow, and enhancing productivity. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Shortcuts to copy and paste emails (Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V) in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to copy and paste emails in Outlook using the shortcuts Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V, allowing them to quickly transfer emails to the desired folder, streamlining workflow, and enhancing productivity. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App centric management for app deployment in Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: App centric management for app deployment will introduce a new admin setting to control who in the tenant has specific Teams apps preinstalled. Similar to app assignments, admins will be able to select from three options: 'Deployed to all users', 'Deployed to specific users and groups', or 'Deployed to no users'. This feature replaces the existing Installed apps section of app setup policies and provides admins with the ability to manage app deployment individually. The Installed apps section of app setup policies for existing customers will be migrated to maintain existing admin settings in the tenant.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App centric management for app deployment in Teams Admin Center
OldVersion.description: App centric management for app deployment will introduce a new admin setting to control who in the tenant has specific Teams apps preinstalled. Similar to app assignments, admins will be able to select from three options: 'Deployed to all users', 'Deployed to specific users and groups', or 'Deployed to no users'. This feature replaces the existing Installed apps section of app setup policies and provides admins with the ability to manage app deployment individually. The Installed apps section of app setup policies for existing customers will be migrated to maintain existing admin settings in the tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share content from webapp (browser) to Teams chats, channels, and meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to share content from a standalone Teams webapp (from the browser) to Teams chats, channels and meetings (before and during the meeting).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share content from webapp (browser) to Teams chats, channels, and meetings
OldVersion.description: Users will now be able to share content from a standalone Teams webapp (from the browser) to Teams chats, channels and meetings (before and during the meeting).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Suggested M365 content in Callouts
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is an improvement on the Interactivity feature in Microsoft Stream, where users with edit access can add document and other links to Callouts at specific times in a video. The goal of the improvement is to make creating and editing of interactive videos easier and quicker for editors by suggesting resources to link based on their M365 user activity. If there are no relevant suggestions, this allows them to search for resources to make their videos interactive from within Microsoft Stream.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Suggested M365 content in Callouts
OldVersion.description: This feature is an improvement on the Interactivity feature in Microsoft Stream, where users with edit access can add document and other links to Callouts at specific times in a video. The goal of the improvement is to make creating and editing of interactive videos easier and quicker for editors by suggesting resources to link based on their M365 user activity. If there are no relevant suggestions, this allows them to search for resources to make their videos interactive from within Microsoft Stream.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Interactivity analytics
CurrentVersion.description: This feature gives audience engagement metrics on interactive Stream videos. Users with edit access to a Stream video that contains links, polls, or callouts will be able to see the number of unique viewers and the percentage of those who viewed or clicked on interactive elements in the video, as well as average number of interactions and average attention time. These metrics help video owners understand which content is most engaging.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Interactivity analytics
OldVersion.description: This feature gives audience engagement metrics on interactive Stream videos. Users with edit access to a Stream video that contains links, polls, or callouts will be able to see the number of unique viewers and the percentage of those who viewed or clicked on interactive elements in the video, as well as average number of interactions and average attention time. These metrics help video owners understand which content is most engaging.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex - Page range setting for prebuilt and structured models
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a new setting for prebuilt (contract, invoice, and receipt) and structured/freeform models to specify the file pages to be processed.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex - Page range setting for prebuilt and structured models
OldVersion.description: This creates a new setting for prebuilt (contract, invoice, and receipt) and structured/freeform models to specify the file pages to be processed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross-platform meetings via SIP join for Teams Rooms
CurrentVersion.description: Joining SIP-based conferencing services like Google Meet, Zoom, Cisco Webex, and others via Teams Rooms offers a seamless collaboration experience, mirroring the native Teams interface. This integration supports features such as 1080p video, dual screen, various layout options, HDMI input, and others contingent on the third-party platform's in-meeting controls. A SIP calling plan from a CVI partner, currently Pexip, is necessary. This is available for Teams Rooms customers with a Pro license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross-platform meetings via SIP join for Teams Rooms
OldVersion.description: Joining SIP-based conferencing services like Google Meet, Zoom, Cisco Webex, and others via Teams Rooms offers a seamless collaboration experience, mirroring the native Teams interface. This integration supports features such as 1080p video, dual screen, various layout options, HDMI input, and others contingent on the third-party platform's in-meeting controls. A SIP calling plan from a CVI partner, currently Pexip, is necessary. This is available for Teams Rooms customers with a Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Admins enabled to make bulk employee ID updates
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will enable Viva Glint service admins to make bulk employee ID updates in the web app.
